title: 40: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 3 ft. Craig Conant
itunes:title: 40: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 3 ft. Craig Conant
description:
The Broads chat this wild episode with Bachelorette newbie Craig Conant (stand up comedian) who swore he would never watch the show. We broke him, Broads! They get into (surprise, surprise) more Luke P. scariness, Cam’s interruptions, Mike’s perfection, Tyler breaking Hannah’s face, the lack of JPJ, nuggets galore and much more!
Check out Craig Conant's podcast @communityservicepodcast and follow him for stand up comedy dates @craigconant
Chatty Broads is produced and recorded at @theblueroommedia  theblueroommedia.com (http://theblueroommedia.com/)
***FAB FIT FUN: Go to  www.FABFITFUN.com and use the code "CHATTY" so you can save $10 off your first box #fabfitfunpartner
***SCENTBIRD: Go to Scentbird.com/CHATTY and sign up for 50% off your first month!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
